links.to: DnsEntry | example.com / TXT | v=spf1 include:spf.mandrillapp.com include:amazonses.com include:sendgrid.net a mx ~all

assetsRelativePathAndTextContent.b:
$TTL 300
@ IN SOA ns1.example.com. admin.example.com. (
  1111111100; serial number
  3600; refresh [1h]
  600; retry [10m]
  86400; expire [1d]
  300); min TTL
;

example.com. 300 NS ns1.example.com.
config 300 A 127.0.0.201
dev 300 A 127.0.0.203
example.com. 300 A 127.0.0.203
example.com. 300 MX 10 mail.example.com.
example.com. 300 TXT "v=spf1 include:spf.mandrillapp.com include:amazonses.com include:sendgrid.net a mx ~all"
follow 300 A 127.0.0.202
follow 300 A 127.0.0.203
h1 300 A 127.0.0.201
h2 300 A 127.0.0.202
h3 300 A 127.0.0.203
login 300 A 127.0.0.201
mail 300 A 127.0.0.202
ns1 300 A 127.0.0.201
ns1 300 A 127.0.0.202
ns2 300 A 127.0.0.201
ns2 300 A 127.0.0.202
www 300 A 127.0.0.203

buildSteps.step: cd /plugins/ && curl -L https://dl.bintray.com/foilen/maven/com/foilen/foilen-infra-plugins-core/0.6.0/foilen-infra-plugins-core-0.6.0.jar -o tmp && mv tmp foilen-infra-plugins-core-0.6.0.jar

resources.resource: Application | infra_url_redirection_http-h1_example_com | Apache HTTP URL redirections for h1.example.com

assetsRelativePathAndTextContent.b:
#!/bin/bash

set -e
source /etc/apache2/envvars
/usr/sbin/apache2ctl start

until [ -f /var/run/apache2/apache2.pid ]
do
	echo Waiting for /var/run/apache2/apache2.pid
	sleep 1
done

APP_PID=$(cat /var/run/apache2/apache2.pid)
while [ -e /proc/$APP_PID ]; do sleep 5; done

echo Apache service is down

<VirtualHost *>
    ServerName config.example.com
    ServerAlias config.example.com
    
    ErrorLog "|/usr/bin/rotatelogs -n 1 /var/log/apache2/config.example.com-error.log 10M"
    CustomLog "|/usr/bin/rotatelogs -n 1 /var/log/apache2/config.example.com-access.log 10M" combined
    
    RewriteEngine On
    RewriteRule /(.*) https://config.example.com/$1 [R,L]
</VirtualHost>

<VirtualHost *>
    ServerName login.example.com
    ServerAlias login.example.com
    
    ErrorLog "|/usr/bin/rotatelogs -n 1 /var/log/apache2/login.example.com-error.log 10M"
    CustomLog "|/usr/bin/rotatelogs -n 1 /var/log/apache2/login.example.com-access.log 10M" combined
    
    RewriteEngine On
    RewriteRule /(.*) https://login.example.com/$1 [R,L]
</VirtualHost>

content.description: Apache HTTP URL redirections for h1.example.com
content.name: infra_url_redirection_http-h1_example_com
content.resourceDescription: Apache HTTP URL redirections for h1.example.com

assetsRelativePathAndTextContent.b:
#!/bin/bash

set -e
source /etc/apache2/envvars
/usr/sbin/apache2ctl start

until [ -f /var/run/apache2/apache2.pid ]
do
	echo Waiting for /var/run/apache2/apache2.pid
	sleep 1
done

APP_PID=$(cat /var/run/apache2/apache2.pid)
while [ -e /proc/$APP_PID ]; do sleep 5; done

echo Apache service is down

<VirtualHost *>
    ServerName example.com
    ServerAlias example.com
    
    ErrorLog "|/usr/bin/rotatelogs -n 1 /var/log/apache2/example.com-error.log 10M"
    CustomLog "|/usr/bin/rotatelogs -n 1 /var/log/apache2/example.com-access.log 10M" combined
    
    RewriteEngine On
    RewriteRule /(.*) https://www.example.com/$1 [R=301,L]
</VirtualHost>

resources.resource: Application | infra_web-h1_example_com | Web HA Proxy for h1.example.com

assetsRelativePathAndTextContent.b:
global
  user haproxy
  group haproxy
  tune.ssl.default-dh-param 1024

defaults
  timeout connect 5000
  timeout client 600000
  timeout server 600000
  timeout tunnel 600000

frontend port_4433
  mode http
  option forwardfor
  option http-server-close
  bind *:4433 ssl crt /certs
  reqadd X-Forwarded-Proto:\ https

  acl https_4433_config.example.com hdr(host) -i config.example.com
  acl https_4433_login.example.com hdr(host) -i login.example.com

  use_backend https_4433_config.example.com if https_4433_config.example.com
  use_backend https_4433_login.example.com if https_4433_login.example.com

frontend port_8080
  mode http
  option forwardfor
  option http-server-close
  bind *:8080
  reqadd X-Forwarded-Proto:\ http

  acl http_8080_config.example.com hdr(host) -i config.example.com
  acl http_8080_login.example.com hdr(host) -i login.example.com

  use_backend http_8080_config.example.com if http_8080_config.example.com
  use_backend http_8080_login.example.com if http_8080_login.example.com

backend https_4433_config.example.com
  option httpclose
  option forwardfor
  mode http
  server https_4433_config.example.com_1 127.0.0.1:10003 check

backend https_4433_login.example.com
  option httpclose
  option forwardfor
  mode http
  server https_4433_login.example.com_1 127.0.0.1:10002 check

backend http_8080_config.example.com
  option httpclose
  option forwardfor
  mode http
  server http_8080_config.example.com_1 127.0.0.1:10000 check

backend http_8080_login.example.com
  option httpclose
  option forwardfor
  mode http
  server http_8080_login.example.com_1 127.0.0.1:10001 check

resources.resource: Application | infra_web-h3_example_com | Web HA Proxy for h3.example.com

assetsRelativePathAndTextContent.b:
global
  user haproxy
  group haproxy
  tune.ssl.default-dh-param 1024

defaults
  timeout connect 5000
  timeout client 600000
  timeout server 600000
  timeout tunnel 600000

frontend port_4433
  mode http
  option forwardfor
  option http-server-close
  bind *:4433 ssl crt /certs
  reqadd X-Forwarded-Proto:\ https

  acl https_4433_dev.example.com hdr(host) -i dev.example.com
  acl https_4433_example.com hdr(host) -i example.com
  acl https_4433_www.example.com hdr(host) -i www.example.com

  http-request replace-header Origin https://dev.example.com(.*) http://dev.example.com\1 if https_4433_dev.example.com
  http-request replace-header Origin https://www.example.com(.*) http://www.example.com\1 if https_4433_www.example.com

  use_backend https_4433_dev.example.com if https_4433_dev.example.com
  use_backend https_4433_example.com if https_4433_example.com
  use_backend https_4433_www.example.com if https_4433_www.example.com

frontend port_8080
  mode http
  option forwardfor
  option http-server-close
  bind *:8080
  reqadd X-Forwarded-Proto:\ http

  acl http_8080_example.com hdr(host) -i example.com

  use_backend http_8080_example.com if http_8080_example.com

backend https_4433_dev.example.com
  option httpclose
  option forwardfor
  mode http
  server https_4433_dev.example.com_1 127.0.0.1:10002 check

backend https_4433_example.com
  option httpclose
  option forwardfor
  mode http
  server https_4433_example.com_1 127.0.0.1:10001 check

backend https_4433_www.example.com
  option httpclose
  option forwardfor
  mode http
  server https_4433_www.example.com_1 127.0.0.1:10003 check

backend http_8080_example.com
  option httpclose
  option forwardfor
  mode http
  server http_8080_example.com_1 127.0.0.1:10000 check

resources.resource: Application | wordpress | Apache and PHP application

assetsRelativePathAndTextContent.b:
#!/bin/bash

set -e
source /etc/apache2/envvars
/usr/sbin/apache2ctl start

until [ -f /var/run/apache2/apache2.pid ]
do
	echo Waiting for /var/run/apache2/apache2.pid
	sleep 1
done

APP_PID=$(cat /var/run/apache2/apache2.pid)
while [ -e /proc/$APP_PID ]; do sleep 5; done

echo Apache service is down

#!/bin/bash

set -e

if [ -d /etc/php5 ]; then
	cd /etc/php5
	for SUB in $(ls); do
		if [ -d $SUB/conf.d/ ]; then
			cp /99-fcloud.ini $SUB/conf.d/
		fi
	done
fi

if [ -d /etc/php ]; then
	cd /etc/php
	for VER in $(ls); do
		cd /etc/php/$VER
		for SUB in $(ls); do
			if [ -d $SUB/conf.d/ ]; then
				cp /99-fcloud.ini $SUB/conf.d/
			fi
		done
	done
fi

<VirtualHost *>
  DocumentRoot /base/
  
  SetEnvIf x-forwarded-proto https HTTPS=on
  
  ErrorLog "|/usr/bin/rotatelogs -n 1 /var/log/apache2/error.log 100M"
  CustomLog "|/usr/bin/rotatelogs -n 1 /var/log/apache2/access.log 100M" combined
  
  <Directory /base/>
    AllowOverride All
    Require all granted
  </Directory>
  
  

</VirtualHost>

resources.resource: Application | wordpress_dev | Apache and PHP application

set -e

if [ -d /etc/php5 ]; then
	cd /etc/php5
	for SUB in $(ls); do
		if [ -d $SUB/conf.d/ ]; then
			cp /99-fcloud.ini $SUB/conf.d/
		fi
	done
fi

if [ -d /etc/php ]; then
	cd /etc/php
	for VER in $(ls); do
		cd /etc/php/$VER
		for SUB in $(ls); do
			if [ -d $SUB/conf.d/ ]; then
				cp /99-fcloud.ini $SUB/conf.d/
			fi
		done
	done
fi

<VirtualHost *>
  DocumentRoot /base/
  
  SetEnvIf x-forwarded-proto https HTTPS=on
  
  ErrorLog "|/usr/bin/rotatelogs -n 1 /var/log/apache2/error.log 100M"
  CustomLog "|/usr/bin/rotatelogs -n 1 /var/log/apache2/access.log 100M" combined
  
  <Directory /base/>
    AllowOverride All
    AuthType Basic
    AuthName "Restricted Content"
    AuthUserFile /htpasswd
    Require valid-user
  </Directory>
  
  

</VirtualHost>
